mst06.message: When the Chaos gauge is full, use the $ button\nto do a Chaos Boost.\fUse the Chaos Boost to destroy\nsolid objects like iron or rocks.

$To move to an adjacent rail, jump while\nusing the left analog stick.
$To move to an adjacent rail, jump while\nusing the left analog stick.
$To move to an adjacent rail, jump while\nusing the left analog stick.
$When you are near a trail of Rings, you can\ndo a Light Dash by pressing the $ button.
$While jumping, press and hold the $ button to fly.\nBe careful, you will tire after flying for too long.
$While jumping, you can Glide by pressing and\nholding the $ button.
$You can Glide by holding the $ button after\njumping.
$After jumping, you can hover by pressing the\n$ button.
$While jumping, pressing the $ button again will\nallow you to perform a Double Jump.
$After jumping, press the $ button to perform\nan Accelerator Tornado.\nYou can jump higher than usual.
$After jumping, you can press and hold the \n$ button to Levitate and move around in the air.
$While jumping, press the $ button to perform a\nHoming Attack.
$Press the $ button to lay a Dummy Ring Bomb.\nHold the $ button to perform a Dummy Ring Snipe.
$Press the $ button once to do a Heat Knuckle, \nagain to do a Back Claw, and a third time to do \na Stone Breaker Punch for a combo attack.
$You can do a Homing Attack by pressing the \n$ button while jumping.
$To defeat enemies, press the $ button. Use the\nOmega Shot when fighting close range enemies,\nand the Lock-on laser for enemies at a distance.
$When you don't want to be discovered, hold the\n$ button to become invisible.
$Hold the $ button and release to perform a\nSpinning Claw. It's effective in situations with \na lot of enemies.
$While jumping, hold the $ button for a long time\nand release to perform a Homing Smash.
$Press and hold the $ button, then release it to\nperform a Screwdriver. It's a Homing Attack that\ntracks enemies.
$Press the $ button just when your Homing\nAttack hits to do a Chaos Attack for additional\ndamage.
$Press the $ button in midair to place a Bat\nCracker Mine. You can place them while\ngliding, too.
$While jumping, press the $ button to use your\nOmega Launcher.
$To throw things you're holding, release the \n$ button to perform a Hold Smash!
$While moving, press the $ button to attack.
$Press the $ button to throw a bomb. Press\nand hold the $ button for a Bomb Snipe.
$While jumping, press the $ button to perform a\nGround Shake. Use this against quick enemies.
$While jumping, press and charge the $ button, then\nrelease it to do a Chaos Smash.
$To use Psychokinesis, press the $ button\nwhile near an object.\nYou can throw items with the $ button.
$While running, hold the $ button and release\nafter a while to perform a Sliding Attack.
$Move the left analog stick and press the $ button\nto perform an Edge Attack.
$Cling to a wall and press the $ button to place\na bomb on the wall.
$Press the $ button twice rapidly to use your\nPsychokinesis over a wider range.
$After jumping, press the $ button to perform a\nBound Attack. If you perform multiple consecutive\nBound Attacks, your jumping height will increase.
$Press the $ button while near Rings to\nperform a Light Dash.
$Press the $ button twice in quick succession to\ndo a Teleport Dash.
$Press the $ button to perform a Spin Kick.\nIf you press the button in succession with proper\ntiming, the range of the attack will increase.
$While jumping, press the $ button to use the\nChaos Spear. The enemies that are hit by\nthis should be momentarily paralyzed.
$Combine the strength of two with the\n$ button and use this new power to get rid of\nanything that blocks your path.
$It looks like that Armed Buggy still runs... \nPress the $ button to get on it.
$Hey, can you still use that Buggy over there?\nYou can get on it with the $ button.
$Press the $ button to accelerate, and use the\nleft analog stick to steer.
$The Buggy is steered with the left analog stick,\nand the $ button accelerates.
$Press the $ button twice quickly\nto do a Boost Dash.
$Press the $ button twice quickly\nto do a Boost Dash.
$Use the $ button to fire Lock-on missiles.
$Use the $ trigger to fire.
$It looks like that bike still runs.\nPress the $ button to get on.
$Use the $ button to fire.
$Even while jumping, the left analog stick\ncontrols the bike.
$Thatâ€™s a Jet Glider over there.\nUse the $ button to get on.
$The $ button increases speed, and the left\nanalog stick steers the craft.
$The $ button decreases speed. While slowing\ndown, you can freely tilt the Glider.
$That's a Hover Vehicle over there.\nPress the $ button to get on.
$The $ button accelerates,\nand the left analog stick steers.
$Press the $ button twice quickly\nto do a Hover Jump.
$Use the $ button to fire lasers.
$Holding the $ button in midair will maintain\nthat altitude.
$Spin the net to make it go faster by \npressing the $ button in front of the net.
$Press and hold the $ button as long as you can,\nand release it right at the jump ramp!
$Press and hold the $ button as long as you can,\nand release it right at the jump ramp!

$Defeating Mephiles' shadows will build up the
Chaos Gauge. $When the Chaos Gauge is full, use the
$ button to do a Chaos Boost. $In this state, where I'm radiating power,
I should be able to drag him out of my shadow.
$The $ button will fire an Omega Shot to blow\naway anything in close range.\f$Press the $ button repeatedly while jumping to \nuse Omega Launcher.
$Press and hold down the $ button to lock on to\ntargets.\f$Release the $ button to initiate an attack on\nall enemies with target locks.

$Everyone!
You need Rings to stay in a Super State, but
maintaining this form consumes Rings! $Make sure you don't run out of Rings!
If you're running low, use the $ button
to switch to someone else!

$If you're in a Super State, you can use the
left analog stick to fly up, down, left or right, and
use the $ button to accelerate. $Use the $ button to attack with your abilities!
Use the $ button to use your Super Gauge!
$Solaris' light shells match up with up, down,\nleft and right with the left analog stick.\nUse it to do damage!
$The more the Super Gauge builds, the more\ndamage the $ button does! But if you get hit,\nyou'll lose energy from the gauge!
$Hey! Do you still have Ring energy?\nUse the $ button to switch with me!
$Are you okay!?\nUse the $ button to switch with me!
$Hey! You're running short on Rings.\nUse the $ button to switch with me!
$When you get close to a trail of Rings, press\nthe $ button to do a Light Dash!
$Press the $ button in the air to do\na Bound Jump. You can attack downward, or\njump high in the air.
$Press the $ button near the trail of Rings\nto do a Light Dash!\nNow you can get to the forest!
$Silver, use my power!\f$Press the $ button to wrap me in flames.\f$If you use your Psychokinesis to grab me, you\nshould be able to launch a powerful attack.

$If he gets in close, you'll have to do a lot of
damage, and push him back. $If you can find an opening and jump on his head,
use the $ button to use your Psychokinesis
on his weak spot.

$That body of light is the sign of a super-
dimensional life form. Standard attacks won't
work on him! He eats dimensions for lunch! $But... There should be something that's
anchoring him in this dimension. $That's probably the light shells that
can be seen on his body. $If all of those are destroyed,
he can be defeated! $Everyone!
You need rings to stay in a Super State, but
maintaining this form consumes rings! $Make sure you don't run out of Rings!
If you're running low, use the $ button
to switch to someone else!
